metadata.Title: CVE-2022-25636 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - high
metadata.Description: net/netfilter/nf_dup_netdev.c in the Linux kernel 5.4 through 5.6.10 allowslocal users to gain privileges because of a heap out-of-bounds write. Thisis related to nf_tables_offload.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
